title: Isolate Terms with $$x$$
text: The first step in solving is to move all the terms containing an $$x$$ to one side of the equation.

title: Divide Coefficient
text: To simplify after isolating all terms with $$x$$ on one side, divide by the coefficient of the term with $$x$$.

title: Equation after Division
text: What is the right hand side of the equation once the constant in front of ln(x) is divided on both sides?

title: Inverse of Natural Log
text: The inverse of the natural log ln is to exponentiate by e.
